entry.title: rammcodes/WowFolio
entry.summary:
Wowfolio ü¶Ñ - A Simple & Clean Portfolio Template For Developers üë®‚Äçüíª

Wowfolio ü¶Ñ

A Simple & Clean Portfolio Template For Developers üë®‚Äçüíª




Test the template with different colours using the colour picker üé®

This is very helpful for you as you can test the template with different colours and see which colour fits your needs so you can use that colour for your own website.




Important Note: Once you found the perfect colour for your site then just note the RGB value of the colour and then go inside this file called style.css on line number 9, and replace the value of the --themeColor variable with your RGB value as shown in the below code example so you can see the colour change in your website.

:root {
  --themeColor: 29, 161, 242; /* Theme Color in (R,G,B) format */
}


Technologies used üõ†Ô∏è

  • HTML üíÄ
  • CSS üåà
  • JavaScript üß†

If you like this project then drop a Github star by pressing the Star button ‚≠ê

entry.title: coolwanglu/pdf2htmlEX
entry.summary:
Convert PDF to HTML without losing text or format.

pdf2htmlEX is no longer under active development. New maintainers are wanted.

# pdf2htmlEX

‰∏ÄÂõæËÉúÂçÉË®Ä
A beautiful demo is worth a thousand words

  • Bible de Gen√®ve, 1564 (fonts and typography): HTML / PDF
  • Cheat Sheet (math formulas): HTML / PDF
  • Scientific Paper (text and figures): HTML / PDF
  • Full Circle Magazine (read while downloading): HTML / PDF
  • Git Manual (CJK support): HTML / PDF

pdf2htmlEX renders PDF files in HTML, utilizing modern Web technologies. Academic papers with lots of formulas and figures? Magazines with complicated layouts? No problem!

pdf2htmlEX is also an online publishing tool which is flexible for many different use cases.

Learn more about who and why should use pdf2htmlEX.

Features

  • Native HTML text with precise font and location.
  • Flexible output: all-in-one HTML or on demand page loading (needs JavaScript).
  • Moderate file size, sometimes even smaller than PDF.
  • Supporting links, outlines (bookmarks), printing, SVG background, Type 3 fonts and more...

Compare to others

Portals

  • üè†Wiki Home
  • Download & Building
  • Quick Start
  • Report Issues / Ask for Help
  • ‚ùìFAQ
  • ‚úâMailing List
  • üÄÑ‰∏≠ÊñáÈÇÆ‰ª∂ÂàóË°®

LICENSE

pdf2htmlEX, as a whole package, is licensed under GPLv3+. Some resource files are released with relaxed licenses, read LICENSE for more details.

Acknowledgements

pdf2htmlEX is made possible thanks to the following projects:

  • poppler
  • Fontforge

pdf2htmlEX is inspired by the following projects:

  • pdftohtml from poppler
  • MuPDF
  • PDF.js
  • Crocodoc
  • Google Doc

Special Thanks

  • Hongliang Tian
  • Wanmin Liu

entry.title: drshahizan/learn-php
entry.summary:
This course is designed to introduce students the fundamental of knowledge, technologies and components for web application developments. The basic topics includes the standard HTML for content creation, CSS for content presentation, JavaScript for client-side logics, PHP for server-side logics and MySQL for data processing.

Don't forget to hit the ‚≠ê if you like this repo.

SCSV1223 - WEB PROGRAMMING

Contents:

  • Course Outline
    • Student Information
    • Code Samples
    • Introduction to Web Programming
    • Visual Studio Code
      • Video
      • Useful Links
    • Code Quality Guide

    • JavaScript
      • Useful Links

    • Contribution üõ†Ô∏è

Synopsis

This course is designed to introduce students the fundamental of knowledge, technologies and components for web application developments. The basic topics includes the standard HTML for content creation, CSS for content presentation, JavaScript for client-side logics, PHP for server-side logics and MySQL for data processing. At the end of the course, the students should be able to apply the web base technologies and then implement it all in the creating functional data-centric online system project.

üî• Important things

  1. Course Outline
  2. Lecture Notes
  3. Code Samples
  4. Buku: Pengaturcaraan Web Hypertext Preprocessor (PHP)
  5. Free Web Development Books
